text: Raúl Eduardo Vela Chiriboga (1 January 1934 – 15 November 2020) was an Ecuadorean prelate of the Catholic Church. He was the Archbishop of Quito from 2003 to 2010. He was born in Riobamba, Ecuador. Vela Chiriboga died on 15 November 2020 in Quito at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile on the Archdiocese of Quito's website *Catholic Hierarchy entry Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Quito Category:Ecuadorian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Raúl Eduardo Vela Chiriboga
